snippet: Two white supremacists were being sought in connection with the killing of the executive director of the state’s prison system, Tom Clements.
abstract: Colorado authorities are seeking white supremacists James Lohr and Thomas Guolee in connection with the killing of Tom Clements, executive director of the state’s prison system.
lead_paragraph: Two white supremacists were being sought in connection with the killing of the executive director of the state’s prison system, Tom Clements.

headline.main: Colorado Seeks Gang Members in Its Inquiry Into Slaying
headline.print_headline: Colorado Seeks Gang Members In Its Inquiry Into Slaying
